BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring review by the landmarks preservation commission before a demolition permit may be issued.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring review by the landmarks preservation commission before a demolition permit may be issued.

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL – 360, LP – 2162, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Germania Bank Building, located at 190 Bowery (aka 1-3 Spring Street) , Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 1, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055504 HKM).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Germania Bank Building, Manhattan (Non-ULURP no. 20055504 HKM)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring review by the landmarks preservation commission before a demolition permit may be issued.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Subcommittee
Items.MatterName: Requiring review by the landmarks preservation commission before a demolition permit may be issued.

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL – 360, LP – 2162, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Germania Bank Building, located at 190 Bowery (aka 1-3 Spring Street) , Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 1, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055504 HKM).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
